fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.style.colorimetry

Class ColorReferenceSystem

  • Object
    • ColorReferenceSystem

  • public class ColorReferenceSystem
extends Object
    The ColorReferenceSystem class represent a specific organization of colors. A ColorReferenceSystem is made up of ColorWheels, themselves are made up of ColorSlices, themselves are made up of ColorimetricColors. The COGIT Color Reference System has been elaborated by Elisabeth Chesneau in her PhD thesis. It is adapted to the representation of hazard maps. It can be displayed using the GeOxygene Application.
    Author:
    Charlotte Hoarau

      • unmarshall

        public static ColorReferenceSystem unmarshall(InputStream stream)
        Load the CRS (Color Reference System) described in the input file. If the file does'nt exist, a new empty CRS is created.
        Parameters:
        stream - Input file describing the CRS to load.
        Returns:
        The CRS described in the input file or a new empty CRS if the file does'nt exist.

      • unmarshall

        public static ColorReferenceSystem unmarshall(String fileName)
        Load the CRS (Color Reference System) described in the XML file. If the file does'nt exist, a new empty CRS is created.
        Parameters:
        fileName - XML file describing the CRS to load.
        Returns:
        The CRS described in the XML file or a new empty CRS if the file does'nt exist.

      • getCOGITColors

        public static List<ColorimetricColor> getCOGITColors()
        This method return the list of all the colors of the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem.
        Returns:
        The list of all the colors of the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem.

      • searchColor

        public static ColorimetricColor searchColor(Color cTest)
        This method find a Java Color in the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem. When the color exist in the color reference system, the method return it. When the color doesn't exist in the color wheel, the method return the nearest color regarding the CIELab Euclidean distance between 2 colors.
        Parameters:
        cTest - The Java Color to find.
        Returns:
        The corresponding COGIT Reference Color or the nearest COGIT Reference Color according to the Euclidean Distance in the CIELab System.

      • isCOGITColor

        public static boolean isCOGITColor(ColorimetricColor c)
        This method indicates whether some ColorimetricColor exists in the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem.
        Parameters:
        c - The color to test.
        Returns:
        True if it's a COGIT color, false otherwise.

      • getPureColors

        public static List<ColorimetricColor> getPureColors()
        This method return the pure colors of the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem. The pure Colors are described in the E.Chesneau's PhD thesis.
        Returns:
        A list with the pure colors of the COGIT ColorReferenceSystem.

        public static ColorReferenceSystem defaultColorRS()
